member.name: P:MvcTurbine.Web.Properties.Resources.ServiceLocatorExceptionMessage
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to MVC Turbine cannot start! You need to specify a valid IServiceLocator for the system to use!
Check the result of your registered ServiceLocatorProvider to see if it's valid..

member.name: P:MvcTurbine.Web.Properties.Resources.ServiceLocatorProviderExceptionMessage
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to MVC Turbine cannot start! You must specify a ServiceLocatorProvider to resolve a IServiceLocator for the system to use. To specify a ServiceLocatorProvider, make sure you call
ServiceLocatorManager.SetLocatorProvider(() => YOUR PROVIDER)
Within the static constructor of your Global.asax.
